meanings.sent1: The little boy had chubby cheeks and was often called chubs by his family.
meanings.sent2: The chubs squirrel happily nibbled on some nuts in the park.
meanings.sent3: The chubs puppy waddled around the yard, looking adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her cat, named Chubs, was so round and fluffy, it looked like a walking pillow.
meanings.sent5: The chubs teddy bear was the perfect cuddle buddy for a rainy day.

meanings.definition: A type of fish commonly found in freshwater.
meanings.sent1: We went fishing by the lake and caught some chubs for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chubs swam gracefully in the clear stream, glinting in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The chubs fisherman proudly displayed his biggest catch of the day.
meanings.sent4: The school of chubs moved in unison, creating mesmerizing patterns in the water.
meanings.sent5: The chubs in the pond were a delight to watch as they darted to and fro.

meanings.definition: A slang term for an erection.
meanings.sent1: He blushed when his friends teased him about getting chubs during class.
meanings.sent2: The embarrassing moment in the locker room led to whispers about chubs.
meanings.sent3: Trying to hide his chubs in public became a comical challenge for him.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected chubs situation made for an awkward encounter at the party.
meanings.sent5: His face turned red as he tried to discreetly adjust his pants to hide the chubs.
